divs: Sighting DetailsSimply I walked outside looked up I was at work as usual when this happened. At first I would be like huh ok whats that its day light giving off an enormous amount of light and I'm like maybe its the reflection of the sun hitting this unknown jet of some kind but then maybe not. Simply because it fade in and out constantly something that jet liners simply do not do so at anyrate this was East of the mountains heading South didn't last very long it is why I don;t have very much to report about but I do believe it was the same object I've already reported twice within the past 3 weeks doing the exact same thing in aprox. same location.
